price: 37. “Ma jirto (nolol) aan aheyn noloshayada adduunka! Waanu dhiman (qaar) oo  noolaan (qaar)! Mana nihin kuwo la soo bixin (nooleyn dhimasho kaddib).
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
